name: Analyze Crypto News Sentiment for Any Token with GPT-4o and Telegram Alerts

user.name: Don Jayamaha Jr
user.bio: With 12 years of experience as a Blockchain Strategist and Web3 Architect, I specialize in bridging the gap between traditional industries and decentralized technologies. My expertise spans tokenized assets, crypto payment integrations, and blockchain-driven market solutions.

description:
A sentiment intelligence sub-agent for the **Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent**. It aggregates crypto news from major sources, filters by token keyword (e.g., BTC, ETH), and produces a Telegram-ready summary including market sentiment and top headlines‚Äîpowered by GPT-4o.

üé• **Live Demo**:
[![Click to Watch](https://img.youtube.com/vi/k9VuU2h5wwI/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/k9VuU2h5wwI)

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Workflow Function

This tool performs the following steps:

| üîß Step                  | üìå Description                                                                |
| ------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Webhook Input            | Accepts `{ "message": "symbol" }` via HTTP POST                             |
| Crypto Keyword Extractor | GPT model extracts the valid crypto symbol (e.g., "SOL", "DOGE", "ETH")       |
| RSS News Aggregators     | Pulls latest headlines from 9+ crypto sources (CoinDesk, Cointelegraph, etc.) |
| Merge & Filter Articles  | Keeps only articles containing the specified token                            |
| Prompt Builder           | Creates prompt for GPT with filtered headlines                                |
| GPT-4o Summarizer        | Summarizes news into 3-part response: Summary, Sentiment, Headline Links      |
| Telegram Formatter       | Converts GPT output into a Telegram-friendly message                          |
| Response Handler         | Returns formatted message to the caller via webhook                           |

---

## üì• Webhook Trigger Format

```json
{
  "message": "ETH"
}
```

This triggers a full execution of the workflow and returns output like:

```
üì£ ETH Sentiment: Neutral

‚Ä¢ BlackRock‚Äôs tokenized fund expands to Ethereum mainnet (CoinDesk)  
‚Ä¢ Ethereum fees remain high, analysts call for L2 migration (NewsBTC)  
‚Ä¢ Vitalik warns about centralized risks in staking (Cointelegraph)
```

---

## üìö Installation Guide

### 1. Import & Enable

* Load the `.json` into your **n8n Editor**
* Enable webhook trigger in the top-right corner
* Ensure it's reachable via `POST /webhook/custom-path`

### 2. Required Credentials

* **OpenAI API Key** (GPT-4o capable)
* No API keys required for RSS feeds

### 3. Connect to Quant Agent

* Add an HTTP Request node in your main AI agent
* Point to this workflow's webhook with body `{ "message": "symbol" }`
* Capture the response to include in your Telegram output

---

## üîç Real Use Cases

| Scenario                           | Result                                                           |
| ---------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| BTC Sentiment before a key event   | Returns 8‚Äì12 filtered articles with bullish/neutral/bearish tone |
| Daily pulse for altcoins like DOGE | Shows relevant headlines, helpful for intraday trading setups    |
| Telegram chatbot integration       | Enables user to query sentiment via `/sentiment ETH`             |
| Macro context for Quant AI outputs | Adds emotional/news context to technical-based trade decisions   |

---

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

workflow.name: Binance SM News and Sentiment Analyst Webhook Tool

options.systemMessage: Your job is to analyze the keyword of the question and output it as a single word.  The keyword will always be the name of a cryptocurrency.

values.content: You are a crypto‚Äêindustry news analyst. Summarize sentiment clearly and concisely.

parameters.content:
##  Extract Keyword 
This AI agent parses the user input and returns a single-word keyword to help match relevant news articles.

## News Aggregators
Pulls articles from major crypto news sources. You can add more RSS feeds here to expand coverage.

## Merge & Filter News
Combines all RSS articles and filters them using the extracted keyword to match only relevant results.

## Prepare AI Prompt
Constructs the input prompt for GPT-4o with a list of filtered articles. Output includes summary, sentiment, and article links.

## Summarize News & Sentiment (GPT-4o)
Uses OpenAI GPT-4o to generate a concise summary of the news, analyze market sentiment, and return formatted results.

## Format for Telegram

Extracts the AI summary and prepares it for Telegram delivery. Change the variable if you want to include other data.

## Webhook Trigger
Node: Webhook
Accepts **incoming HTTP POST requests**.
Expected body format:

json
{ "message": "<symbol>" }

This kicks off the **full news + sentiment analysis process** for a given crypto asset.

## Return Results to Caller
Node: Respond to Webhook
**Sends the final formatted message** back to the parent workflow that triggered the call.

# üì∞ Binance SM News and Sentiment Analyst Webhook Tool ‚Äì Documentation

A sentiment intelligence sub-agent that aggregates crypto news from top-tier RSS feeds, filters it based on a given token, and generates a market sentiment summary + headline list formatted for Telegram.

---

## üéØ Purpose

This tool is responsible for:

* Accepting a webhook request with a token symbol (e.g., `DOGE`, `SOL`)
* Aggregating recent articles from 9+ major crypto news feeds
* Filtering for articles relevant to the symbol
* Summarizing the sentiment and key headlines using GPT-4o
* Returning a Telegram-friendly formatted response to the caller

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Architecture & Key Components

| Component                          | Role                                                           |
| ---------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üîó `Webhook`                       | Triggered externally with `{ message: "BTC" }`                 |
| üß† `Crypto News & Sentiment Agent` | Uses GPT to extract the correct crypto keyword                 |
| üîÑ RSS Feed Readers                | Pull from Cointelegraph, Coindesk, NewsBTC, Bitcoinist, etc.   |
| üì¶ `Merge All Articles`            | Combines articles into one stream                              |
| üßπ `Filter by Query`               | Keeps only the news relevant to the requested token            |
| üìù `Build Prompt`                  | Builds natural-language prompt to send to GPT                  |
| üß† `Summarize News & Sentiment`    | GPT-4o summarizes the filtered articles with sentiment scoring |
| üßæ `Prepare Telegram Message`      | Formats the final summary in clean, Telegram-readable style    |
| üì§ `Respond to Webhook`            | Returns the message to the triggering parent workflow          |

---

## üì• Webhook Input

> Expects a simple HTTP POST to the webhook endpoint:

```json
{
  "message": "ETH"
}
```

This triggers a full pipeline execution, resulting in a text summary like:

---

## üì§ Sample Output Format

```
üì£ ETH Sentiment: Neutral

‚Ä¢ BlackRock‚Äôs tokenized fund expands to Ethereum mainnet (CoinDesk)  
‚Ä¢ Ethereum fees remain high, analysts call for L2 migration (NewsBTC)  
‚Ä¢ Vitalik warns about centralized risks in staking (Cointelegraph)
```

---

## üîç Use Cases

| Scenario                                   | Outcome                                              |
| ------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Sentiment summary for BTC                  | Fetches 8‚Äì12 filtered headlines, extracts tone       |
| Daily news pulse for SOL                   | Shows project-related news with brief sentiment flag |
| Enhances technical analysis interpretation | Adds macro/emotional context to trend setups         |
| Telegram bot asks for XRP sentiment        | Sends full response back to user instantly           |

---

## üìö How to Install

### 1. Import & Activate

1. Load the `.json` into your n8n instance
2. Enable the webhook
3. Link to parent agent (`Financial Analyst`, `Quant Agent`)

### 2. Set Credentials

* Requires a working **OpenAI API Key** (for GPT-4o)
* No authentication required for RSS sources

### 3. Connect to Caller

Any external workflow (like your `Quant AI Agent`) can call this by:

* Using HTTP Request Node
* POSTing to this webhook with `{ message: "BTC" }` in the body

---
